## admiral ping

run `ansible -m ping` on requested host

```
admiral ping hostname [flags]
```

### Examples

```
admiral ping host1
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ping
```

* [admiral](admiral.md)	 - Admiral is a lightweight Ansible inventory database management tool
